plot outline: Jeerjimbe is a story of adventures of a 13 year old girl from a remote village in Karnataka. The story is based on emotional struggles of a girl when a bicycle enters her life as part of free cycles programs provided by the Government to all high school children in rural areas.
title: Jeerjimbe
plot: A schoolgirl races against time in a government-issued bicycle to escape child marriage.

_Jeerjimbe_ (qv) is a story of adventures of a 13 year old girl from a remote village in Karnataka. The story is based on emotional struggles of a girl when a bicycle enters her life as part of free cycles programs provided by the Government to all high school children in rural areas.
